column.name: Nachricht
column.value:
"This is the automated Echo Daemon "+context.SmtpUser +" on "+context.SMTPHost+". To avoid spam, only one Mail within "+context.Purge_time_Minutes+" Minutes is answered. Every other mail is just deleted. Attached you will find your mail with all your attributes.
Enjoy and have FUN"
